data.name: LIMINAL PHASE
data.detailed_description:
Feedback, ideas or just want to hang out? Join our community on Discord!


About the Game

LIMINAL PHASE takes you on a journey through a fractured mind battling psychic pain and on the brink of a mental breakdown. Frank is obsessed with videogames. One day there's a mysterious package by the door containing a floppy disk game called Sanctum 3-D. The more Frank plays the game, the harder it becomes to separate fantasy from reality. Now he must face his deepest fears in order to save himself from reaching the bottom of the dark spiral he's caught in.

Fight disturbing monsters, solve peculiar puzzles and explore the twisted and horrific environments that Frank's mind constructs in this psychological horror action game for VR. The game is set in an alternate 1990s with a surreal twist. LIMINAL PHASE is inspired by games and movies from that era when CRT TVs, MS-DOS, and big box PC games were a thing.

FEATURES

  • An immersive linear action horror story in VR
  • Horrific monsters and bizarre weapons
  • An original soundtrack and binaural sound design
  • Hidden secrets and easter eggs
  • Collectibles and Steam achievements
  • Free movement, teleport, smooth and snap turn
  • Support for LIV (Capture yourself inside VR)

    TRAVEL BACK TO THE '90s

    EXPLORE A FRACTURED MIND

    FACE DISTURBING CREATURES

    KEEP CLEAR OF THE LOCKED DOOR!

data.short_description: LIMINAL PHASE is a VR action horror game set in an alternate '90s. Fight disturbing monsters, solve peculiar puzzles, and explore a fractured mind that is obsessed with videogames.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains depictions of violence in a low-poly esthetic, mild nudity as well as horror situations.
